header.title: mod_alias

description.p: Erlang web server internal API for handling of, for example, interaction data exported by module mod_alias.

func.name: default_index(ConfigDB, Path) -> NewPath
func.fsummary: Returns a new path with the default resource or file appended.

desc.p: If Path is a directory, default_index/2, it starts searching for resources or files that are specified in the config directive DirectoryIndex. If an appropriate resource or file is found, it is appended to the end of Path and then returned. Path is returned unaltered if no appropriate file is found or if Path is not a directory. config_db() is the server config file in ETS table format as described in Inets User's Guide.

func.name: path(PathData, ConfigDB, RequestURI) -> Path
func.fsummary: Returns the file path to a URL.

desc.p: path/3 returns the file Path in the RequestURI (see RFC 1945). If the interaction data {real_name,{Path,AfterPath}} has been exported by mod_alias, Path is returned. If no interaction data has been exported, ServerRoot is used to generate a file Path. config_db() and interaction_data() are as defined in Inets User's Guide.

func.name: real_name(ConfigDB, RequestURI, Aliases) -> Ret
func.fsummary: Expands a request URI using Aliases config directives.

desc.p: real_name/3 traverses Aliases, typically extracted from ConfigDB, and matches each FakeName with RequestURI. If a match is found, FakeName is replaced with RealName in the match. The resulting path is split into two parts, ShortPath and AfterPath, as defined in httpd_util:split_path/1. Path is generated from ShortPath, that is, the result from default_index/2 with ShortPath as an argument. config_db() is the server config file in ETS table format as described in Inets User's Guide.

func.name: real_script_name(ConfigDB, RequestURI, ScriptAliases) -> Ret
func.fsummary: Expands a request URI using ScriptAliases config directives.

desc.p: real_script_name/3 traverses ScriptAliases, typically extracted from ConfigDB, and matches each FakeName with RequestURI. If a match is found, FakeName is replaced with RealName in the match. If the resulting match is not an executable script, not_a_script is returned. If it is a script, the resulting script path is in two parts, ShortPath and AfterPath, as defined in httpd_util:split_script_path/1. config_db() is the server config file in ETS table format as described in Inets User's Guide.
